features: 【UPGRADED FLIP-TOP SPOUT】: We've upgraded the oil spout based on user experience, it can lessen your burden of using the oil dispenser. (1)The auto flip-top spout helps you to easily control the amount of oil that comes out, you just need a thumb to trigger it. (2)The cover can be fully closed when not in use, which will do a great job of sealing, and keeping everything fresh and clean.

【VALUABLE & PREMIUM SET】: GMISUN is devoted to oil dispenser bottle for years, and we have confidence that we can provide high-quality and affordable oil bottle. This oil and vinegar dispenser set comes with 4 olive oil dispenser bottles, 5 auto-flip spouts, 4 preprinted labels, 4 blank labels, and a wide-open funnel. It can meet your daily sauces needs such as olive oil, cooking oil, vinegar, cooking wine, soy sauce, etc.

【CHOOSE GMISUN TO ORGANIZE YOUR KITCHEN】(1) Use our non-drip spout the control the amount of oil that comes out, which will help to keep your countertop clean. (2) Using our preprinted and blank labels to signify your sauce easily, help you make no mistake in taking the wrong sauce. (3) A high-quality set of 4 is absolutely your ideal kitchen collection which will amaze your families.

【MULTI PURPOSE】Our oil dispenser bottle for kitchen is suitable for cooking oil, olive oil, vinegar, salad dressings, soy sauce, hot sauce, etc. You can also take them as oil container to store your extra oil, homemade sauce, extracts, and syrups. Our upgraded spout will keep everything fresh and clean, this set will meet most of your daily needs.

【ENVIRONMENTALLY FRIENDLY】: GMISUN pursues environmental protection, uses high-quality glass bottles, and we do our best to protect the olive oil dispenser bottle while reducing packaging. If you have any issues with the products you receive, please feel free to contact us and we will solve the issues to your satisfaction.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Elevate Your Cooking Experience with GMISUN's Oil and Vinegar Cruet Set
reviews.reviewText: The GMISUN Olive Oil Dispenser Bottle and Vinegar Cruet Set is a must-have kitchen accessory for any home cook or food enthusiast. This set includes three clear glass bottles, each with a 17oz/500ml capacity, perfect for holding your favorite cooking oils, vinegars, and dressings.The bottles come with easy-to-use pour spouts that make it easy to control the amount of oil or vinegar you add to your dishes. The set also includes a handy funnel for easy filling and custom labels to keep track of the contents of each bottle.Made from high-quality glass, these bottles are both durable and elegant, adding a touch of sophistication to your kitchen. They are also easy to clean and dishwasher safe, making them a practical choice for any home cook.Overall, the GMISUN Olive Oil Dispenser Bottle and Vinegar Cruet Set is a fantastic addition to any kitchen. Its sleek design, practical features, and convenient accessories make it a great way to elevate your cooking experience and take your dishes to the next level

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: They look great, the seal works good, I'm very happy to have bought these!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very good product. Very sturdy. It’s real glass.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love these bottles but
reviews.reviewText: I love the look. I love the ease of use. I wish there was a way to close the top thogh. Other than that great product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Sleek, easily fits into my herb cabinet, filled them with 3 vinegars and cooking oil, labels are quite handy. Spout let's out just the right amount, the price is very reasonable, packaging was sturdy, no breakage and an extra spout was supplied, thank you!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Simple and functional with a minimalist appeal. Comes with easy fill funnel which is great. I buy my oils in bulk at Costco and save a ton because of these. Oil despenses at just the right pace and volume.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These were well packaged, modern bottles. It even came with a little funnel!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bottles aren’t very think glass. Tops have a little lid and I switched out two for a faster flow. Great value for the price and product.

I love them. They do not leak. It is also great for the portion control, that is, the oil that comes out is not too much or not too little. It is easy to control the amount and avoid accidental over-dressing of the salads. It is easy to clean, and the labels are water-resistant. I washed the bottles with the labels on them and the labels were still intact! It came with a funnel for easy filling. Also, they put an extra lid (I had four bottles but 5 lids). Perhaps the one extra is a back up.

I love these glass containers! They look so much nicer and organized in the pantry and they are leak proof. Need to buy another set since I am using them for all cooking liquids like olive oil, avocado oil, balsamic vinegar, white vinegar, apple cider vinegar, lime juice etc. Great purchase!
they are nice and seal well. easy to wash and look nice on my shelf
The glass does feel a bit fragile but so far they are working great.
